p: When we evaluated the proportion transmitting in terms of days post-exposure (5, 8 and 11 only) none of the treatments were transmitting on days 5 or 8 dpi. On day 11, the transmission rates were 5%, 10% and 15% in groups OLDER, S.OLDER and YOUNG, respectively. These differences were not statistically significant using the Chi-square test for proportions ( P > 0.5) (Additional file 1: Table S1).
